medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced new-onset severe epigastric pain 3 days ago after dinner. The pain persisted and was somewhat sharp but aching, associated with nausea. It improved somewhat over the past two days but did not fully resolve. No diarrhea or other changes in bowel habits were noted. The patient reported 'feeling hot' during the time of her most severe pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: RLE neuralgia (resolving) secondary to compression one month ago; Anxiety. Previous surgical history includes R. meniscal repair.
